1.title: Fairy Book Club
1.plot: Susan holds a book club with fairies and the result is not quite what she expected it to be.

imdb.plot outline: Susan invites fairies from her backyard to a book club to discuss the mystery novel Murder on Sunset Blvd. The fairies make comments about the book like "Why don't humans fly?" "I wish they threw a magic potion instead of chasing the bad guys." The fairies impose their fairy point of view on the book, and Susan grows frustrated. She gets angry and tells the fairies that humans don't even believe they are real. The fairies are shocked and disappointed, and vow to keep an open mind so that they can continue to play with Susan.
imdb.title: Fairy Book Club
plot: Susan invites fairies to join her book centered on a murder mystery novel only to discover that fairies see the world very differently from humans.::Karen Krantz
